creditline: Gift of Eric Brecher in honor of Pradeep Hathiramani and Otto Warmbier
description: rotting corpse of a young man at C is being supported by three other men, while two women weep at his mangled legs and feet; men supporting corpse all have rotting faces; man at L has stern look on face and holds up two bloody fingers; man at back center smiles; man at R weeps
signed: signature and date bottom edge L in black: James Chapin - 1967-1969
title: A Medal for Johnnie
